verbs.description: another [V: aging] [ARG1: us air force t-38 trainer aircraft] crashed in texas a t-38c talon ii trainer aircraft crashed tuesday at sheppard air force base both pilots were able to eject safely and are in stable condition at local medical facilities tuesday incident marks the fourth t-38 crash in a year trainer capt paul j barbour laughlin air force base wichita falls us air force aircraft columbus air force base us del rio vance air force base united states air force sheppard air force base texas
